author: jleroux
msg: Partially fix an issue I discussed with Akash on dev ML on how to format decimals in prices
* I removed unused currency.decimal.format calls in CheckOutEvents class
* Also removed unused priceNumberFormat in UtilFormatOut class
Still have to fix 11 harcoded  "##0.00" in ftl files using ofbizCurrency

author: fmeschbe
msg: SLING-1200 The BootstrapInstaller class takes over control of whether to go into the configured start level after initial installation or restart the framework. To this avail the framework startlevel property is set to one to not start all bundles in the first place should the framework be restarted.

author: noble
msg: SOLR-1600 A single value in amultivalued field means the value will not be a collection for javabin
